item0.name: Prowler's Claw
item0.description:
60 Attack Damage
21 Lethality
20 Ability Haste

Active - Sandswipe: Dash through target enemy, dealing (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. For the next 3 seconds, you deal 15% increased damage to the target. (60s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Lethality

item1.name: Edge of Night
item1.description:
50 Attack Damage
10 Lethality
325 Health
  • Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item4.name: Serylda's Grudge
item4.description:
45 Attack Damage
30% Armor Penetration
20 Ability Haste
  • Bitter Cold: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

item5.name: Serpent's Fang
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
  • Shield Reaver: Attacks and spells deal (70 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) additional physical damage to Shielded targets.

    Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item0.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

60 Attack Damage
21 Lethality
20 Ability Haste

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Lethality

item2.name: Serpent's Fang
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
  • Shield Reaver: Attacks and spells deal (70 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) additional physical damage to Shielded targets.

    Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.

item3.name: Serrated Dirk
item3.description:
30 Attack Damage
  • Gouge: Gain 10 Lethality.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Electrocute
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

item2.name: Tear of the Goddess
item2.description:
240 Mana
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
  • Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.

    Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item1.name: Executioner's Calling
item1.description:
15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
item2.description:
60 Attack Damage
18 Lethality

Active - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).
  • Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.

    Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

45 Attack Damage
30% Armor Penetration
20 Ability Haste
  • Bitter Cold: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item5.name: Divine Sunderer
item5.description:
40 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
  • Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

    Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

item1.name: Stridebreaker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
300 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item1.name: Stridebreaker

45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
300 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Serylda's Grudge
item2.description:
45 Attack Damage
30% Armor Penetration

45 Move Speed

item4.name: Chempunk Chainsword
item4.description:
45 Attack Damage
150 Health
15 Ability Haste
  • Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item5.name: Ravenous Hydra
item5.description:
65 Attack Damage
20 Ability Haste
10% Omnivamp
  • Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other enemies near target hit.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).
